title: [Large-Scale] Mobile Device-Enabled Visual Arts Education Administrator Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone operation skills and digital content consumption experience
context.additional_context: Enhancing competency in acquiring and applying visual arts education methods using smartphones for corporate managers/leaders aged 40 and above

learning_goals: Learners can analyze visual artworks and create digital portfolios using smartphone camera/editing apps
Learners can collaborate with team members to plan visual projects and provide feedback using mobile collaboration tools
Learners can design a mobile-based learning framework for visual arts education in corporate settings with three or more stages

resources: Free Image Editing Apps (Canva, Snapseed, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
